body.p: Gentoo Linux made a great showing at Linux World Expo in San Francisco, and you can read all about that in this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. Other content includes a call for a Dutch lead translator for the Gentoo Documentation Project, an artcle on using the 'script' command to store and share the output of a terminal session, and the return of Portage Watch with 510 updated packages in the past two weeks. Enjoy!
